# Sitting Room (Room)
## Overview
**Sitting Room**

**Earnings** Influence +4 

**Benefit** bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local), and [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks 

**Create** 12 Goods, 12 Labor (480 gp); **Time** 24 days 

**Size** 6â€“10 squares 

This is a room used for meeting and entertaining in a relaxed, comfortable setting, such as a den, dining room, or smoking room. It has furnishings appropriate to its function (chairs for a sitting room, table and chairs for a dining room, and so on). By spending an hour conversing with guests in a social manner, the host of the room gains a +1 bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local), and [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks to influence or learn about those guests for the next 24 hours.
